H0.text: Decrease effort is the most likely purpose of a simple machine that has a mechanical advantage equal to 1.

H1.text: Decrease work would be the most likely use of a simple machine that has a mechanical advantage of 1.

H2.text: Changing direction is the most likely use of a simple machine that has a mechanical advantage equal to 1.

H3.text: Change resistance is what a simple machine with a mechanical advantage equal to 1 would most likely be used to accomplish.

A4.text: A simple machine with a mechanical advantage of 1 does not amplify the output force compared to the input force, making it suitable for changing the direction of the applied force.
